function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Zoonotic infections from domestic and wild animals leading to pandemics","Impact":"Severe economic disruption and disaster if not mitigated","Mitigation":"Improved animal-to-human interaction management, surveillance and control of zoonotic pathogens","Technologies":"DNA sequencing for pathogen identification, development of vaccines and antiviral drugs","People":"General population, healthcare workers, travelers, individuals in regions with high animal-to-human interaction","Owner":"Healthcare systems, governments, animal control agencies"},{"Description":"Spread risk based on population, poverty level, trade and travel, health systems and environmental factors","Impact":"Potential for localized outbreaks due to mutated strains","Mitigation":"Improved surveillance and control of environmental factors, poverty alleviation, travel restrictions in high-risk areas","Technologies":"Data analytics for monitoring population movement and environmental factors, vaccine development, poverty alleviation strategies","People":"General population, travelers, individuals in regions with specific environmental factors","Owner":"Healthcare systems, governments, environmental agencies"}]}
